text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Cohere: Welcome to my birthday party, I am so happy you can come.
Adam: Thanks for inviting me. Here is the gift for you. Happy birthday, Francis! Many more happy and healthy years for you!
Cohere: Thank you, shall I open it now?
Adam: Yes, please do.
Cohere: Wow, a remote car model and my favorite brand. I really like it. That is so nice of you.
Adam: Yeah, I was really struggling whether I should give you this nice little car. It was the last one they had and I really like it so much myself.
Cohere: Typical you, always wanting to keep the best things for yourself. The more I appreciate the gift now.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
text.Response A: Adam comes to the birthday party of Francis and sends him a remote car model.
text.Response B: Adam is inviting Cohere to his birthday party and also bringing a gift for him. Cohere is happy to receive the gift, which is a remote car model and his favorite brand. Adam explains that he was struggling whether to give Cohere the gift as he really likes it himself. Cohere jokingly accuses Adam of always wanting to keep the best things for himself. Adam laughs and the conversation continues.
